briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Bexagliflozin in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients With Moderate Renal Impairment
officialTitle: A Double Blind Placebo Controlled Study to Evaluate the Effect of Bexagliflozin Tablets on Hemoglobin A1c in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and Moderate Renal Impairment
summary: This was a phase 3, multi-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of oral administration of bexagliflozin at 20 mg versus placebo in subjects with T2DM, moderate renal impairment and inadequate glycemic control.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in HbA1c at 24 Weeks
